description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Become the hero of Triburius.  Fight through 15 levels and face off against 11 unique AI styles and 8 different puzzles.  A fast paced realtime strategy game where you will face-off against trolls, two-headed giants, demons and more...
